name: Shape Shuffle
description: This game is far for complete but It was all I could muster out for LD35. Had a great time making it. I have uploaded an updated version at here, Dragon Road that is not for Ludum Dare but as a separate game. That's for checking it out. If you would like to follow the development please consider following me on itch. Any suggestions for a name would be appreciated. I'd appreciate if you would check out my youtube channel, here. I will take any suggestions into account for the game expanded from this one.
